医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
NIAID 为 10 个改进梅毒诊断工具的项目提供资助美国国立卫生研究院的国家过敏和传染病研究所 (NIAID) 已为 10 个项目提供了赠款，以改进先天性和成人梅毒的诊断工具；目前通过一系列测试来诊断这些疾病，但每种测试的精确度有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/NIAID-awards-grants-for-10-projects-to-improve-diagnostic-tools-for-syphilis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/NIAID-awards-grants-for-10-projects-to-improve-diagnostic-tools-for-syphilis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c61e097-32a5-4be8-a357-26e9a0058402 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 14:32:26 -0400 NIAID awards grants for 10 projects to improve diagnostic tools for syphilis
研究表明床上屏幕的使用会扰乱青少年的睡眠奥塔哥大学的一项研究发现，尽管我们一直相信，晚上使用屏幕的时间，而不是活动本身，会对青少年的睡眠产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-in-bed-screen-use-disrupts-adolescent-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-in-bed-screen-use-disrupts-adolescent-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b9d24b4-fc14-4c7c-a0fc-2fa209de0ef0 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 14:29:07 -0400 Study reveals in-bed screen use disrupts adolescent sleep
RNA Therapeutics Core 在麻省布里格姆总医院启动，以促进环状 RNA 研究麻省总医院布里格姆基因和细胞治疗研究所 (GCTI) 今天宣布推出了 RNA 治疗核心，这是一种首创、最先进的设施和资源，旨在促进 RNA 技术在体内和体内的使用。超越麻省总医院布里格姆研究生态系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/RNA-Therapeutics-Core-launches-at-Mass-General-Brigham-to-boost-circular-RNA-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/RNA-Therapeutics-Core-launches-at-Mass-General-Brigham-to-boost-circular-RNA-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a7e25d6-82d5-4e92-9d42-c7d326eaf66f Tue, 03 Sep 2024 14:16:59 -0400 RNA Therapeutics Core launches at Mass General Brigham to boost circular RNA research
研究揭示了 ChatGPT-4 Vision 在放射学考试表现方面的优势和劣势评估 ChatGPT-4 Vision 性能的研究人员发现，该模型在基于文本的放射学考试问题上表现良好，但很难准确回答与图像相关的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-ChatGPT-4-Visions-strengths-and-weaknesses-in-radiology-exam-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-ChatGPT-4-Visions-strengths-and-weaknesses-in-radiology-exam-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=664a1de3-06b1-43e5-ae30-d95cdfa4c370 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 14:02:02 -0400 Study reveals ChatGPT-4 Vision's strengths and weaknesses in radiology exam performance
新的学习技术增强了青少年心理健康障碍的检测和预测大多数精神健康障碍在青春期出现，并与神经生物学和环境因素的多重相互作用有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/New-learning-technique-enhances-detection-and-prediction-of-adolescent-mental-health-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/New-learning-technique-enhances-detection-and-prediction-of-adolescent-mental-health-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9867ca5e-b546-4741-b9ca-55931fd50a99 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 13:48:00 -0400 New learning technique enhances detection and prediction of adolescent mental health disorders
测试多种药物治疗进行性核上性麻痹的重大试验一项将同时测试三种药物并可能包括更多药物的临床试验为进行性核上性麻痹 (PSP) 患者带来了新的希望，PSP 是一种无法治愈的神经退行性疾病，通常在症状出现后七年内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Major-trial-to-test-multiple-drugs-for-progressive-supranuclear-palsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Major-trial-to-test-multiple-drugs-for-progressive-supranuclear-palsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=552eb47d-b711-4658-b641-9546350dba3b Tue, 03 Sep 2024 13:35:51 -0400 Major trial to test multiple drugs for progressive supranuclear palsy
NSF AIRFoundry 推进 RNA 技术和纳米颗粒设计在典型的铸造厂中，钢和铜等原材料被熔化并倒入模具中，以呈现新的形状和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/NSF-AIRFoundry-to-advance-RNA-technology-and-nanoarticle-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/NSF-AIRFoundry-to-advance-RNA-technology-and-nanoarticle-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4db5ff5f-e647-4d5b-a6b0-c94cfe31ee5a Tue, 03 Sep 2024 13:31:46 -0400 NSF AIRFoundry to advance RNA technology and nanoparticle design
宾夕法尼亚大学的研究发现了诊断结节病的关键生物标志物结节病是一种罕见的全身性疾病，在美国约有 20 万人受其影响，其中黑人居多，女性多于男性，特别是当它引起慢性皮肤病时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Penn-research-uncovers-key-biomarker-for-diagnosing-sarcoidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Penn-research-uncovers-key-biomarker-for-diagnosing-sarcoidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29f154fa-5801-4eb1-aad8-d97cbd8948ed Tue, 03 Sep 2024 13:25:57 -0400 Penn research uncovers key biomarker for diagnosing sarcoidosis
新框架倡导后数字性公民身份以打击校园暴力英格兰各地学校中的性暴力和性别暴力（SGBV）不仅仅是一系列孤立的事件，而是一个根深蒂固的系统性问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/New-framework-advocates-for-post-digital- Sex-citizenship-to-combat-school-violence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/New-framework-advocates-for-post-digital- Sex-citizenship-to-combat-school-violence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb8d1a8d-322b-49d2-afbf-bf209afb0c7e Tue, 03 Sep 2024 13:18:32 -0400
微透析如何有利于药物开发在本次采访中，了解 Charles River 如何利用微透析的力量进行药物开发以及中枢神经系统治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/How-can-microdiaanalysis-benefit-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/How-can-microdialysis-benefit-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94dfd534-b7c0-4519-909b-81c484e06098 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 11:26:00 -0400 How can microdialysis benefit drug development
